text:
機動捜査隊（通称:機捜）を舞台に、犯人逮捕にすべてを懸ける"機捜"エンターテインメント！
そんな金曜ドラマ「MIU404」から「オリジナルジャンパー 2024ver.」 が登場！
中はメッシュ仕様でムレにくく、背中には通気性の高いベンチレーション。 袖口はゴム仕様で、裾口も絞れるよう紐付きなので動きやすい。 機能性抜群のオリジナルジャンパーです。
trans:
An "Investigative Mobile Unit" (commonly known as "Mobile Investigation") entertainment set in a Mobile Investigation that puts everything on the line to capture criminals!
From the Friday drama "MIU404", the "Original Jumper 2024 Edition" is now available!
The side features a mesh lining to reduce stuffiness, with high-breathability ventilation on the back. The cuffs are elastic, and the hem is adjustable with a drawstring, making it easy to move around. This original jumper is packed with functionality.
